text.tspan: Prove which data trained a model
Byzantine nodes cannot compromise the data
SCION's secure path segmentation eliminates MITM attacks
Optimised for parallel I/O, huge model files, fast pre-fetching
fuse split into three services and proofs generated fot
Ai Job writes 500GB model to FUSE
Chunks distributed over n nodes with BFT consensus
Metadata is cryptographically hashed and verified using Hotstuff
Data moves securely and avoids path hijacking
Data at rest remains encrypted with verified integrity
The world's most secure, scalable, and provable AI data platform
Support efficient indexing, retrieval, and sparse updates
(e.g., columnar storage, tensor-native, or graph-based formats).
: Verify that a node accessed data correctly.
USP: Every time you pull a model, you also pull:
proving the model has not been tampered.
